page.title: 01MILFORD on SEA INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our village (meaning Milford on Sea) is noisy and busy. Milford on Sea is one of the last sea side villages along the south coast.The council say they can't build anything else.Not many tourists visit this village ,apart from the two caravan sites that this village holds. The houses are mainly modern, apart from some which were seventeenth century. Walking from the busy roads into the country lanes is just like walking through a sound barrier.The back lanes of Milford show you what the coutry is really like. The people are friendly.
